measured_by: free-form forecasting paradigm (participants place points on a blank time-series plot)
justification: The authors state that Stage I (Prior condition) was "designed to extract participants' structured priors" and that they "used a free-form forecasting paradigm in which participants were shown an empty plotting area" to generate those priors.

measured_by: Gaussian Process kernel fitting to participants’ forecasts
justification: The paper explains "We will use the form of this kernel to assess structured priors in human forecasting" and later describes how they "fitted Gaussian Process (GP) regressions, with each of the eleven possible compositional kernels, to every forecast" to quantify those priors.
